## CachedPatch

**Source**: [`code/github/types.go:60`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/code/github/types.go#L60)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type CachedPatch struct {
	ID int64
	FixID string
	FilePath string
	Issue string
	Severity string
	Confidence float64
	CreatedAt time.Time
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface CachedPatch {
  /**
   * Database primary key
   */
  ID: number;
  /**
   * Fix suggestion ID (e.g., "FIX-1")
   */
  FixID: string;
  /**
   * Path to the file being patched
   */
  FilePath: string;
  /**
   * Description of the issue
   */
  Issue: string;
  /**
   * Severity level (low, medium, high)
   */
  Severity: string;
  /**
   * AI confidence in the fix (0.0-1.0)
   */
  Confidence: number;
  /**
   * When the patch was generated
   */
  CreatedAt: string;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>

<td>

```typescript
export interface FixContext {
  /**
   * The actual problematic lines
   */
  ProblematicCode: string;
  /**
   * Context lines before/after
   */
  SurroundingCode: string;
  /**
   * Full file for reference
   */
  FileContent: string;
}
```

## FixResult

**Source**: [`code/github/types.go:38`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/code/github/types.go#L38)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type FixResult struct {
	Transform *ast.ASTTransformation `json:"transform,omitempty"`
	Reasoning string `json:"reasoning"`
	Confidence float64 `json:"confidence"`
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface FixResult {
  /**
   * AST transformation (semantic code change) This is format-preserving and whitespace-agnostic
   */
  transform?: ASTTransformation | null;
  /**
   * Metadata
   */
  reasoning: string;
  /**
   * AI's confidence in the fix (0.0-1.0)
   */
  confidence: number;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>

## FixSuggestion

**Source**: [`code/github/types.go:13`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/code/github/types.go#L13)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type FixSuggestion struct {
	ID string `json:"id"`
	Category string `json:"category"`
	Title string `json:"title"`
	File string `json:"file"`
	StartLine int `json:"start_line"`
	EndLine int `json:"end_line"`
	StartCharacter int `json:"start_character,omitempty"`
	Issue string `json:"issue"`
	Severity string `json:"severity"`
	Patch string `json:"patch"`
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface FixSuggestion {
  id: string;
  /**
   * e.g., "SEC" (security), "DRY" (don't repeat yourself), "GO" (Go idioms), "PERF" (performance)
   */
  category: string;
  title: string;
  file: string;
  start_line: number;
  end_line: number;
  /**
   * 0-based column position (optional, PR #173)
   */
  start_character?: number;
  issue: string;
  severity: string;
  patch: string;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>

## PatchResult

**Source**: [`code/github/types.go:50`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/code/github/types.go#L50)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type PatchResult struct {
	Suggestion *FixSuggestion
	Patch *FixResult
	Error error
	PatchID int64
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface PatchResult {
  /**
   * The original fix suggestion
   */
  Suggestion?: FixSuggestion | null;
  /**
   * The generated patch (nil if error)
   */
  Patch?: FixResult | null;
  /**
   * Any error during patch generation
   */
  Error: string;
  /**
   * Database ID if saved (0 if not saved)
   */
  PatchID: number;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>

## StalenessInfo

**Source**: [`code/github/types.go:72`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/code/github/types.go#L72)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type StalenessInfo struct {
	IsStale bool
	ReviewTime string
	FileModTime string
	FileCommits int
	PackageCommits int
	ElsewhereCommits int
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface StalenessInfo {
  /**
   * Whether the code has changed since review
   */
  IsStale: boolean;
  /**
   * When the review was performed
   */
  ReviewTime: string;
  /**
   * Last modification time of the file
   */
  FileModTime: string;
  /**
   * Commits to the specific file
   */
  FileCommits: number;
  /**
   * Commits to files in the same package/directory
   */
  PackageCommits: number;
  /**
   * Commits to files outside the package
   */
  ElsewhereCommits: number;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>
